org.ardenus.input.controller.wireless

Class WirelessController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.input.controller.Controller
      • org.ardenus.input.controller.wireless.WirelessController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PegaController, PlayStationController, SwitchController, XboxController

    public abstract class WirelessController
extends Controller
    A wireless controller.

    • Method Detail

      • getController

        public static WirelessController getController(WirelessInputHandler handler,
                                               int jid)
        Creates a wireless controller using the specified joystick ID.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler the controller belongs to.
        jid - the controller joystick ID.
        Returns:
        the generated controller.

      • getJID

        public int getJID()
        Returns:
        the joystick ID.

      • getGuid

        public java.lang.String getGuid()
        Returns:
        the globally unique ID.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of the controller.

      • isUsingDisconnectButtons

        public boolean isUsingDisconnectButtons()
        Returns:
        true if the controller will disconnect if the disconnect buttons are simultaneously pressed, false otherwise.

      • setUsingDisconnectButtons

        public void setUsingDisconnectButtons(boolean useDisconnectButtons)
        Parameters:
        useDisconnectButtons - true if the controller should disconnect when the disconnect buttons are simultaneously pressed, false otherwise.

      • checkDisconnect

        protected final boolean checkDisconnect(boolean[] buttonStatuses)
        Checks whether or not the controller should be disconnected based on the specified button status array with the index of the boolean being the ID of the button.
        Parameters:
        buttonStatuses - the buttons.
        Returns:
        true if the controller did indeed get disconnected, false otherwise.

      • updateGLFWData

        public abstract void updateGLFWData(java.nio.FloatBuffer axes,
                                    java.nio.ByteBuffer buttons,
                                    java.nio.ByteBuffer hats)
        Updates the controller using the data retrieved from GLFW.
        Parameters:
        axes - the axes.
        buttons - the buttons.
        hats - the hats.

      • getDisconnectButtons

        public abstract ControllerButton[][] getDisconnectButtons()
        Returns:
        a list of buttons that are used when disconnecting the controller (pressing all of them simultaneously will cause the controller to automatically disconnect) and that will be ignored when determining whether or not the controller should be connected.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Controller
